content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, and I'm here to help you schedule an appointment. Can I please have your name to get started?
Thank you, Mrs. Vickers. May I have your address so I can check if we serve your area?
Thank you! One moment while I check if 412 Spruce Lane is within our service area.
I'm having trouble verifying your address in our service system at the moment. Let me have one of our team members follow up with you and make sure we can get you taken care of as soon as possible.
reason: Agent unable to calculate service area, human follow-up required.
